explains: n. 飞行员；快车；飞行物；（美）广告传单
n. （Flier）人名；（德）弗利尔；（英）弗莱尔

sentences.en: A man named Peter recognized his lost dog and called the number on the flier.
sentences.cn: 一个名叫彼得的人认出了他走失的狗，于是拨打了传单上的号码。

sentences.en: The earth-men saw that the flier was brilliantly illuminated, pouring out a gorgeous amethystine radiance from its violet ports.
sentences.cn: 地上的人看到传单被照亮了，从紫罗兰色的端口中倒出了华丽的紫水晶光芒。

sentences.en: Someone gave me this flier at the exit.
sentences.cn: 在出口处有人给我发了这张传单。
